title: Biology Education Curriculum Utilizing Collaborative Concept Mapping-Based Digital Games

context.additional_context: Project-based assessment process conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain core biology concepts (cell structure, photosynthesis, gene expression, etc.) through collaborative concept-mapping digital games
Learners can construct complex biology concepts into visual concept maps through peer collaboration and generate shared documents
Learners can solve biology concept application problems with over 80% accuracy after game-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
